trans-unit.source: Represents a rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 代表規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>與<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ExceptionValidationRule class is a built-in rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the updates of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: ExceptionValidationRule 類別是一種內建規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can provide custom logic to specify how the binding engine handles these exceptions by using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供自訂邏輯以指定繫結引擎如何處理這些例外狀況使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>

trans-unit.source: An alternative syntax to setting the ExceptionValidationRule explicitly is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> property to `true` on your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 明確設定 ExceptionValidationRule 替代語法是設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>屬性`true`上您<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立自訂規則，藉由建立衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>類別

trans-unit.source: For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和資料驗證的詳細的討論，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
The value (from the binding target) to check.
The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: 要用於此規則的文化特性。
